name: Magnificent Chateau in Brittany
description:
DESCRIPTION
This Chateau and its estate is a magnificent venue for weddings and other events in Brittany. The Chateau, with its neogothic architecture set in its park and gardens, provides a unique setting for any special celebration. The chateau has been refurbished but the overall layout of the rooms have not been changed and many of the original features conserved. The castle depicts all you would expect from such a dwelling; large open fireplaces, chandeliers, elegant salons, numerous bedrooms, oak panelled dining room.
The oak-panelled dining room with its adjoining salon is ideal for candlelit dinners (capacity 40). We can easily cater for events with up to 100 guests though, with buffet dinners and cocktails being served in the chateau. If you have more than 100 guests, we offer seated dining in our marquee that will be erected in the chateau grounds. There are also 9 bedrooms (over 2 floors) provide a sleeping capacity of 15 for your family and friends within the Chateau. Our very spacious 6-bedroom, 19th century lodge also has two bedrooms with en suite bathrooms on the ground floor and a further 4 upstairs, (2 with bathrooms and 2 share a bath room).
For us every event is unique and we are able to adapt to your wishes and budget. Our in-house caterer and his team of dedicated staff can provide the catering for the most elaborate wedding and also simpler menus around the special occasion.
The Chateau offers:
-Plenty of possibilities both inside and outside to entertain your guests
-Gardens and the Pavilion for a wedding blessing
-Terraces or the Lodge for cocktails and canapés
-Elegant salons for the wedding reception
-The Lodge and Pavilion for a late night party
-Excellent chef that can tailor the catering to your wishes and budget
-Recommended suppliers to assure the event is run to perfection.
The Chateau also has 300-acres of private forest and lake, ideal for walks (marked trails), and some stunning spots for your photographs. Within the gardens of the Chateau, guests will find a private swimming pool (15m) and tennis court for you and your family and friends to use throughout their stay. The pool has a cover to extend the swimming season from April to October. The fully covered pool can be opened in warm weather.
For the days approaching your wedding there is so much to do in the surrounding area!
Nearby activities include horse riding, golfing, canoeing and kayak and spa facilities offering relaxation and beauty treatments. In close proximity are a number of pretty villages, botanical gardens, classic car museum, and an animated harbour. The family beaches are also renowned for their sea food and we propose a visit to the oyster beds. Lastly there are a number of golf courses are in proximity.
If you would like us to provide you with any more information then please do let us know as we would love to make this magical Chateau your dream French wedding venue.
Travel arrangements: Saint Malo Ferry (45km)
2023: From 5,800€ which includes 2 nights for full privatisation of the Chateau and 16 bedrooms for 40 guests. 3 nights from 6,200€.
